description: TECP Policy Registry - Machine-readable policy definitions with compliance mappings

no_retention.description: Data is not stored after processing completes - ephemeral execution only
no_retention.technical_details: Execution environment destroyed after processing with cryptographic key erasure

eu_region.description: Processing occurs within European Union jurisdiction
eu_region.technical_details: Infrastructure attestation proves geographic location of processing

no_export_pii.description: Personally identifiable information is filtered from outputs
no_export_pii.technical_details: Code audit proves PII detection and filtering mechanisms

hipaa_safe.description: Processing meets HIPAA Safe Harbor requirements for PHI
hipaa_safe.technical_details: Implements HIPAA Safe Harbor de-identification methods

ttl_5s.description: Processing environment destroyed within 5 seconds maximum
ttl_5s.technical_details: Cryptographic timer enforces maximum execution lifetime

ttl_60s.description: Processing environment destroyed within 60 seconds maximum
ttl_60s.technical_details: Cryptographic timer enforces maximum execution lifetime

ttl_300s.description: Processing environment destroyed within 5 minutes maximum
ttl_300s.technical_details: Cryptographic timer enforces maximum execution lifetime

key_erasure.description: Cryptographic keys irreversibly destroyed after use
key_erasure.technical_details: Monotonic counters or cryptographic accumulators prove key destruction

no_model_training.description: Input data is not used for machine learning model training
no_model_training.technical_details: Code audit proves no gradient updates or model parameter changes

audit_trail.description: Complete audit trail of data processing steps maintained
audit_trail.technical_details: Cryptographic chain of custody with immutable audit log

no_front_running.description: Financial data processing prevents front-running opportunities
no_front_running.technical_details: Temporal isolation prevents information leakage to trading systems

mifid_compliant.description: Processing meets MiFID II transaction reporting requirements
mifid_compliant.technical_details: Automated compliance reporting with regulatory-required fields

fair_access.description: Market data processing provides fair access without preferential treatment

no_price_manipulation.description: Trading analysis prevents price manipulation opportunities
no_price_manipulation.technical_details: Analysis algorithms audited for manipulation detection and prevention

test_env.description: Processing occurs in test/development environment (not production)

key_articles.Art17: Right to erasure (right to be forgotten)
key_articles.Art45: Transfers on the basis of an adequacy decision

HIPAA.name: Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act

pci_dss_compliant.description: Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard compliance
pci_dss_compliant.technical_details: Secure cardholder data environment with encryption and access controls

sox_compliant.description: Sarbanes-Oxley Act compliance for financial reporting
sox_compliant.technical_details: Automated audit trails and internal controls over financial reporting

iso27001_compliant.description: ISO 27001 Information Security Management System compliance
iso27001_compliant.technical_details: Information security controls and risk management framework

gdpr_art6_lawful.description: GDPR Article 6 lawful basis for processing established
gdpr_art6_lawful.technical_details: Automated validation of lawful basis before data processing

ccpa_opt_out.description: CCPA consumer right to opt-out of sale respected
ccpa_opt_out.technical_details: Real-time validation of consumer opt-out preferences

enforcement_types.design: Policy enforced through system architecture and design
enforcement_types.infrastructure: Policy enforced through infrastructure configuration and attestation
enforcement_types.code_audit: Policy enforced through audited code implementation
enforcement_types.runtime: Policy enforced through runtime monitoring and controls
enforcement_types.cryptographic: Policy enforced through cryptographic proofs and mechanisms
